features: STRONG FRAGRANCE：The combination of soft white musk and steady cedar scent will give you a sense of calm and comfort. excellent emotional healer.
WHAT YOU GET：A translucent, stylish black glass bottle with a 7.04 fl oz premium blend of essential oils and 5 reed sticks.

SAFETY & NATURAL INGREDIENTS：Made from botanicals extracted from nature. We strictly adhere to IFRA standards and regulations and refuse to use trichloroethylene, didecyl dimethyl ammonium chloride, toluene, xylene and styrene.

LONG-LASTING USE：The more diffusion sticks you put in, the stronger the fragrance. The fragrance spreads as the stick absorbs the essential oils. If the fragrance is not strong enough, you can replace the stick and continue to use it, or turning the original stick upside down.

A THOUGHTFUL GIFT：Reed diffusers can as a congratulatory gift for family, friends and colleagues,suitable for weddings, birthdays, rehabilitation, housewarming, Valentine's Day, Christmas, holidays, Mother's Day and Father's Day, etc.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: XEPTLE Four Seasons Reed Diffusers offer exclusive seasonal fragrances. Whether you're looking to embrace the freshness of spring, the vibrancy of summer, the coziness of autumn, or the warmth of winter, our carefully crafted scents provide a captivating olfactory journey. Embrace the unique aromas of XEPTLE and welcome each season in style.

Own it! Fall in Love with it! XEPTLE's Reed Diffusers Redefine Your Scented Lifestyle XEPTLE reed diffusers are crafted from premium plant-based ingredients, offering a safe and convenient way to naturally diffuse fragrance without the need for electricity or flames.

Previous page Creating a tranquil atmosphere Reed diffusers emit a gentle aroma, creating a relaxing ambiance that aids sleep and reduces stress. Elevate Ambiance Reed diffusers enhance the living room ambiance for a relaxed and cozy feel, ensuring guest comfort. Mask Odors The fragrance's aroma masks bathroom odors for a more pleasant experience. Enhance concentration Fragrance enhances focus, boosts work efficiency, and fosters a harmonious workplace. Next page 1 Bedroom 2 Livingroom 3 Washroom 4 Office

Versatile and Multi-functional Potent The reed diffuser offers robust fragrance diffusion with an expansive scent coverage. Long-lasting A reed diffuser covers 215 sq. ft and provides a prolonged and enduring fragrance diffusion, up to 120 days. Deodorizing The reed diffuser effectively eliminates odors and purifies the air. Decorative The reed diffuser boasts a fashionable design, making it an ideal choice for both home decor and gifting.

What are the fragrance notes of the four scents? Oud & Bergamot - Woody Fragrance Red Currants - Woody Fragrance + Light Sourness Peony - Floral & Fruity Fragrance White Musk & Cedar - Premium Perfume Fragrance How is the diffusion effect, and how long can it be used? A reed diffuser covers 215 sq. ft and lasts 90 to 120 days. Which one is the strong fragrance, and which one is the light fragrance? Strong：Oud & Bergamot、White Musk & Cedar Light：Red Currants、Peony How often should I replace the reeds? If you find the fragrance isn't strong enough, you can flip the reeds to continue using. Our reeds are reusable.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 3, 2023
reviews.reviewText: It has really sweet strong scent which is ideal for large room. I kep t in bathroom and I felt the smell is too strong, after shifting it to one of the entryway. If smells really good

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best Natural Smell...
reviews.reviewText: I ordered this to try out a natural fragrance diffuser that promises to freshen up the living room with its delightful scents. This particular diffuser comes with five sticks and offers a convenient and elegant way to create a pleasant atmosphere in your home. This natural fragrances in this diffuser are simply wonderful. They are carefully crafted to provide a refreshing and inviting ambiance in any living room. The scents are neither overpowering nor artificial, but rather they create a subtle and soothing aroma that fills the space without overwhelming the senses. The natural fragrances add a touch of luxury and sophistication to the room, making it a pleasure to be in. The diffuser itself is easy to use and requires minimal effort to set up. Simply insert the sticks into the bottle filled with the fragrant oil, and they will gradually absorb the oil and release the scent into the air. The package includes five sticks, allowing you to adjust the intensity of the fragrance according to your preference. You can start with one or two sticks and add more if you desire a stronger scent.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 1, 2023
Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I got the Oud & Bergamot, and it smells like 250 year old lady perfume!! It’s so strong and an absolute horrible smell.It gave me a migraineI love bergamot but smells nothing like it

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I had never used reeds before.
reviews.reviewText: I was first drawn to the name, Bergmont, because I do love the scent, using the reeds I was skeptical. When it arrived I put the reeds that came with it in the jar and was disappointed. I ordered reeds that absorb better and used them when they came. I loved the scent, it filled my bathroom and large walk-in closetto ascent that truly was heavenly. Later I added a couple more reeds to intensify the smell and was not disappointed. Problem the more reeds the faster the liquid is soaked up. This was sold at a great and affordable price and I am buying an another. The bottle was very heavy and high end, I intend using the bottle again. My husband went into the closet a couple days later said it smelled like an expensive store.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 22, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I really like using reed diffusers throughout my home. The brand I used for years no longer exists. I tried this hoping it would be an acceptable replacement. While the fragrance is very different from what I used to use, this presents an opportunity to try something new. It smells nice and the bottle is very attractive so, I have to give it a 5 star rating.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars No musk, no cedar
reviews.reviewText: The white musk cedar scent is not for me. I expected spicy and tangy and I got sweet like granny perfume. I do really like the look and the packaging, so might try one of the other scents in this line.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Smells great and perfect for small spaces
reviews.reviewText: Very happy with the purchase . Used it in my bathroom, its so refreshing and the smell is so great and not overwhelmingly strong. easy to handle . looks decorative.
